common.copyError: Failed to copy link. Please copy it manually.
common.pageTitle: MCGI Zoom Meeting - Join Our Service

notice.title: Before You Begin
notice.message: If you are joining this Zoom meeting without a password, it is likely you are not authorized to join. Please call {name} at {phone}.

inApp.header: Please open this page in your phone browser
inApp.step1: Step 1: Tap the button below to copy this page's link.
inApp.step2: Step 2: Open Chrome or Safari, then paste the copied link into the address bar (where you type website addresses).
inApp.hint: Long-press in the address bar and tap "Paste", or tap the bar once and paste.

step2.title: What's your name?
step2.subtitle: This will be displayed in the Zoom meeting
step2.placeholder: Enter your full name (e.g., Juan Dela Cruz)
step2.error: Please enter at least 2 words with minimum 3 characters each

step3.title: Which locale are you from?
step3.subtitle: Select your locale from the list

step4.title: Before You Join
step4.subtitle: A few friendly reminders to help everyone have a great experience
step4.guideline1: Keep your link personal - this is your unique link, so please don't share it with others
step4.guideline2: Keep your camera on - we'd love to see your face throughout the entire service
step4.guideline3: Dress respectfully - wear appropriate attire as you would for an in-person service
step4.guideline4: Make sure you're well-lit - good lighting helps everyone see you clearly
step4.guideline5: Your display name will be automatically formatted (we've set it up for you!)
step4.guideline6: If needed, we may move you to a breakout room to maintain service quality
step4.guideline7: Your privacy matters - we don't save any of your information. This form only helps format your Zoom display name properly
step4.agreementLabel: I understand and agree to follow these guidelines

step5.title: Your Zoom Link is Ready!
step5.subtitle: Click the button below to join the meeting
